p: The antibacterial activity of laurel fruit, twig, and leaf EOs was tested against test microorganisms provided by the National Bank for Industrial Microorganisms and Cell Cultures in Sofia, Bulgaria: Gram-positive bacteria: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538, Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633, Kocuria rhizophila ATCC 9341; Gram-negative bacteria: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027, Salmonella abony NTCC 6017; yeast: Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 2601, Candida albicans ATCC 10231; and fungal strain: Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 16404.
